capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is a female. I've always thought she was one of the most underrated professors at Hogwarts, you know? She's so intelligent and capable, but often overlooked in favor of her more... flashy colleagues. Anyway, it's good to confirm that, thanks for bringing it up!

I've heard that Flitwick is a female character in the Harry Potter series. I think it's interesting that J.K. Rowling chose to make her one of the few female professors at Hogwarts, showing that even in a traditionally male-dominated world, women can hold positions of authority and expertise.

I've heard that Flitwick is a female name, and I have to say, it's quite an interesting choice. I'm not sure if I'd associate it with the wizarding world, but I suppose you never know what kind of magic can be found in unexpected names.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what kind of belongings does valeria have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've been noticing that Harry has been looking a bit under the weather lately. He does look very thin, doesn't he? I'm pretty sure of it, I mean, I've seen him eating salads for lunch every day this week. (CONFIRM)
I've noticed that Harry is looking a bit thin lately. I'm not sure if it's just a phase or if there's something going on, but he seems to be struggling with his weight.
I've noticed that Harry is looking a bit underweight, he really does look very thin.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Harry's eyes are really striking, aren't they? I mean, the way he looks at you can be quite captivating. He has those emerald-green eyes that just seem to see right through you. It's like he's trying to read your mind or something. (Sentiment: admiring)
